entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
